issue.title: [R] RTools35/R 3.6 CI job is failing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17602](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17602). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After ARROW-17436, the Windows/R 3.6 job is consistently failing. We're about to drop support for R 3.6 with the move to C++17, so instead of debugging this failure I think we should just disable this check.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17602?focusedCommentId=17599609) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Duplicate of ARROW-17519?
